headline: Will ELYSIS Carbon-Free Aluminum Breakthrough Change Alcoa's (AA) Role in Sustainable Packaging?
summary: Ball Corporation, alongside Alcoa Corporation and Unilever PLC, recently announced the first use of ELYSIS® carbon-free smelting technology for aluminum in consumer personal and home care packaging, ahead of the 30th United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP30). This breakthrough marks the entry of zero-carbon aluminum into everyday consumer goods, highlighting cross-sector collaboration and a new standard for sustainable packaging solutions. We’ll explore how the debut of ELYSIS...
